homeHeader.title: Import, Innovate, & Package — Obtain Your UAE Industrial License in Days, Not Weeks
homeHeader.description: Struggling with regulatory red tape, costly approvals, and complex compliance requirements? Launch, operate, and scale your industrial plant, manufacturing factory, or assembly unit in the UAE with our fully managed industrial licensing services. Our expert business consultants take care of every step, so you can start leasing and building 100% compliant and stress-free.

leftSection_5.title: How to Get Your Industrial License in the UAE in 5 Simple Steps

items.title: Select Your Jurisdiction
items.description: We’ll kick off your licensing journey with a discovery call to assess your business goals and suggest the ideal location and license type.

items.title: Secure the Necessary Approvals
items.description: Next, our experts provide you with a checklist of the required documents and assist in obtaining pre-approvals.

items.title: Reserve a DED-Approved Name
items.description: With the pre-approvals secured, our team provides a list of professional and unique trade names and reserves the one that matches your needs.

items.title: Lease a Facility & Office Space
items.description: Once we reserve the best-fit name, the next step is to rent an Ejari-registered warehouse or factory, and office space.

items.title: Obtain Your Industrial License
items.description: Lastly, we’ll help you submit all the necessary paperwork to the relevant regulatory bodies to receive your industrial license, valid for up to 5 years.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a UAE industrial license?
items.answer: An industrial license in Dubai, UAE, allows manufacturing and industrial organisations to import and purchase raw materials, fabricate products, assemble, and package them fully legally.

items.question: Do I need to lease a warehouse or facility to apply for an industrial license?
items.answer: Yes, you’ll have to lease or rent a warehouse, factory, or plant, and office space to obtain a Dubai industrial license.

items.question: How long does it take to receive an industrial license?
items.answer: It generally takes 1-21 days to secure an industrial license; however, our experts help slash licensing times by half by streamlining the process.

items.question: Can expats enjoy 100% ownership with a professional industrial license?
items.answer: Yes, an industrial license offers mainland and free zone companies full strategic ownership of their company.

items.question: Can I apply for visas under an industrial license?
items.answer: Yes, our experts assist you in applying for the appropriate visa, depending on your location, facility size, and the region’s capacity guidelines.
